name: Spring4shell by Wicked Good Development
summary: Did Spring4Shell set the internet on fire again? Not so fast. In a special episode of Wicked Good Development we dissect the zero-day RCE vulnerability in the Spring Framework dubbed Spring4Shell or Springshell. From comparisons to Log4j to how to remediate it and what versions on vulnerable, the experts on today's show break down what we know so far about this new vulnerability. And most importantly, how to determine if you're affected.
